title: 领地
author: 真版2012

replies.author: BYC
replies.txt_content:
打开plugins文件夹，找到Residence文件夹，打开，找到config.yml，用笔记本格式打开。
找到# The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
MaxResidences:数字（越大越好）
       # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
MaxAreasPerResidence:数字
       # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
MaxEastWest: 数字
       # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
MaxNorthSouth: 数字
       # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
MaxUpDown: 数字
然后再打开服务器，然后你懂得……
